data.name: Fist of Jesus Short Film and Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
As a result of popular feedback, Kiss are pleased to announce the release of additional content for Fist of Jesus.

This DLC includes:



The award winning Fist of Jesus short film which the game is based on - you simply have to watch it! (run time: 14 mins & 42 secs)

  • Directed by Adrián Cardona and David Muñoz
  • Screenplay by David Muñoz
  • Game Soundtrack by Damián Sanchez

The sound track from the game:

  • Main Theme
  • Western
  • Rome
  • Jerusalem
  • Final Boss

This is one DLC you really do need

data.short_description: A must have DLC.  Watch the award winning short movie in all its unholy glory.

fullgame.name: Fist of Jesus: the Bloody Gospel of Judas

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities; generally everything made since 2004 should work.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP+
  • Processor: 2Ghz Core Intel 2 Duo or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities; with 1GB Memory

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities; generally everything made since 2004 should work.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.6+
  • Processor: 2Ghz Core Intel 2 Duo or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities; with 1GB Memory

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.10+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities; generally everything made since 2004 should work.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.10+
  • Processor: 2Ghz Core Intel 2 Duo or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities; with 1GB Memory
